author: Will Jones
description:
The US Supreme Court has delivered a bombshell ruling that individual judges lack the power to issue nationwide injunctions and block the policies of President Trump or any other administration.

The post Supreme Court Bombshell Ruling Declares Individual Judges Cannot Block Trump’s Policies appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Supreme Court Bombshell Ruling Declares Individual Judges Cannot Block Trump’s Policies

author: Will Jones
description:
Keir Starmer’s Northern Ireland veterans' tsar has said plans to axe a law protecting Troubles veterans from prosecution are "two-tier justice" since former IRA terrorists will keep their own legal protections.

The post Starmer’s Tsar Attacks “Two-Tier” Plans to Prosecute Northern Ireland Veterans While Ex-IRA Terrorists Remain Immune appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Starmer’s Tsar Attacks “Two-Tier” Plans to Prosecute Northern Ireland Veterans While Ex-IRA Terrorists Remain Immune

author: Will Jones
description:
Keir Starmer has said he "deeply" regrets saying that Britain risked becoming an "island of strangers" because of mass immigration, in the latest U-turn to appease his Left-wing MPs at the expense of the public.

The post I Deeply Regret “Island of Strangers” Speech, Says Starmer appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: I Deeply Regret “Island of Strangers” Speech, Says Starmer

author: David Shipley
description:
Is Englishness a club which people can join if they dress in the right way, or is it something born of ancestry and a sense of belonging to our land? The Right needs to answer the English question, says David Shipley.

The post The Right Needs to Answer the English Question appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: The Right Needs to Answer the English Question

author: Chris Morrison
description:
What is the point of the Met Office, asks Chris Morrison. £300 million a year to serve up climate scaremongering from corrupted and invented temperature data. DOGE, your services are required!

The post What is the Point of the UK Met Office? appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: What is the Point of the UK Met Office?

author: Richard Eldred
description:
In Episode 42 of the Sceptic: Fleur Meston on 9-month abortion and assisted suicide, Dr Alka Seghal Cuthbert on the tyranny of the Equality Act and Andrew Gilligan on 'Islamophobia' and the rape gangs inquiry.

The post The Sceptic | Episode 42: Fleur Meston on Parliament’s Week of Death, Alka Seghal Cuthbert on Equality Act Tyranny and Andrew Gilligan on ‘Islamophobia’ appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: The Sceptic | Episode 42: Fleur Meston on Parliament’s Week of Death, Alka Seghal Cuthbert on Equality Act Tyranny and Andrew Gilligan on ‘Islamophobia’

author: Richard Eldred
description:
A summary of the most interesting stories in the past 24 hours that challenge the prevailing orthodoxy about the ‘climate emergency’, public health ‘crises’ and the supposed moral defects of Western civilisation.

The post News Round-Up appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: News Round-Up
